beaches.name: Maldives Beach,Maldives
beaches.description: A tropical paradise with pristine white sand beaches and crystal-clear waters.

beaches.name: Goa Beach, India
beaches.description: Famous for its vibrant nightlife and picturesque coastline.

cities.name: Amritsar,India
cities.description: A city known for the Golden Temple, one of the holiest sites in Sikhism.

cities.name: Dehradun,India
cities.description: A serene city surrounded by the Himalayan foothills, close to the Kedarnath Temple.

cities.name: Auckland,New Zealand
cities.description: A vibrant city known for its beautiful harbors and diverse culture.

cities.name: Wellington,New Zealand
cities.description: The capital of New Zealand, renowned for its arts scene and stunning landscapes.

temples.name: Golden Temple, Amritsar
temples.description: A spiritual and architectural marvel, the Golden Temple is the holiest site in Sikhism, located in Amritsar.

temples.name: Kedarnath Temple,India
temples.description: A revered pilgrimage site in the Himalayas, dedicated to Lord Shiva, located in Kedarnath.
